question: Dr. Patel is looking for a townhouse that will not go beyond her $470,000 budget. She saw a property that has a selling price of $420,000. On top of that, the buyer has to pay a brokerage fee which is 3% of the selling price, and also the transfer fee that is 10% of the selling price. How much more is the total price of the townhouse than Dr. Patel's budget?
